snippet: Carmelo Anthony and Amar’e Stoudemire, two Knicks’ players who are in their prime, have not shown they can click at the same time, though they are essential components of a team that shed its young players in the off-season.
abstract: New York Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony and center Amar'e Stoudemire, essential components of a team that has been shedding its young players this off-season, have yet to show that they can to work together.
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony and Amar’e Stoudemire, two Knicks’ players who are in their prime, have not shown they can click at the same time, though they are essential components of a team that shed its young players in the off-season.

headline.seo: Analysts Weigh In on Getting Knicks’ Carmelo Anthony and Amar’e Stoudemire in Sync
headline.main: Analysts Weigh In on Getting Anthony and Stoudemire in Sync
headline.print_headline: Analysts Weigh In on Getting Anthony and Stoudemire in Sync
